body:
Alright let's get started so my name is TahkoHD or xXGamingFoxXx either way most people don't know me since I left BUT(T) I recently found myself sitting in class wondering what would happen if I started to play video games again ( I went into a Netflix day/night phase)
Either way I am coming back to play some nebula ( only game I like) so without wasting anymore of your time ... I MISSED YOU! <3
